author: beane
text:
I honestly couldn't even finish reading that article. 

The hate is so unnecessary. 

"'Sheila identified as non-binary, but for the purposes of this article...my apologies.'"

And THEN dedicate THAT to their memory?!

What a sick, twisted fuck that prick is. 🚮

For what it's worth, it was absolutely stunning. Danger noodles are so fascinating.
